modShortDescription: Wasteland is now harder and if you're not prepared, at least the night in cities probably give you headaches to survive. Also made it a bit more realistic.
modDescription:
This is Claymore’s tweaked spawning, he use more or less since A16\. He was too lazy to make it a XPATH mod, but now decided, to finally get it done. Not too hard, because it’s simply a remove and append.

Wasteland is now harder and if you’re not prepared, at least the night in the cities probably give you headaches to survive. Also made it a bit [more](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) realistic. For example: At the day, animals and zombies can die, because it’s too hot. Same for snow, but here in the night, because it’s too cold. Overall it’s harder and more [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) than the vanilla will spawn. But also more [animals](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/), so [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/food-mods/) won’t be that of a problem.

Compatibility: A17+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/eh2x8ufrkywl0yp/Claymore_Spawning_Tweaked.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
